app_name: Love Idol - Beauty Dress Up for Android - Free App Download
about_section: Love Idol - Beauty Dress Up is a simulation game developed by Joy GAMES. The APK has been available since November 2024 . In the last 30 days, the app was downloaded about 1.7 million times. It's top ranked. It's rated 4.71 out of 5 stars, based on 29 thousand ratings. The last update of the app was on May 30, 2025 . Love Idol - Beauty Dress Up has a content rating "Everyone" . Love Idol - Beauty Dress Up has an APK download size of 204.99 MB and the latest version available is 1.2.0 . Designed for Android version 6.0+ . Love Idol - Beauty Dress Up is FREE to download.
app_description:
Step into the dazzling world of Love Idol, where your fashion dreams come to life! Dive into this ultimate dress up games extravaganza🌟, perfecting your avatar’s makeup and transforming them into a style icon.
🎤 Makeup Gameplay 🎤
👗 Start your amazing makeover journey in Love Idol and dress up your idol doll with trendy looks. Mix and match tons of clothing and accessories to find the perfect look.
👗 Snap glamorous photos against custom backdrops or compete in thrilling makeover face-offs against other players! Win these fashion duels and climb the leaderboards, all while interacting in live streams with fans, boosting your popularity and experiencing the life of a idol star!
👠 Makeover Game Features 👠
🌈 Endless Fashion Possibilities - Explore a plethora of dress up games options with new outfit and accessory updates every season!
🎨 Personalize Your Avatar - From sophisticated makeup and exciting makeovers, create an avatar that truly represents your unique style.
📹 Interactive Engagement - Interact with fans, receive gifts, and showcase your exquisite makeover and dress-up tips in real-time.
🏆 Competitive Dress Up Duels - Showcase your styling prowess in theme-based dress up games and emerge victorious!
🌟 Live your Idol Dream - Embrace the life of an idol with dynamic interactions and grow your fanbase.
💄 Experience the magic of Love Idol as you unleash your creativity with stunning makeup, fabulous makeovers, and live streaming fun! Embark on a captivating journey with Love Idol, where creativity meets glamour in electrifying dress up game!
🌟 Get in Touch with Us! 🌟 
Email: dudugamestudio@gmail.com
We’d love to hear from you!
Recent changes:
Create a unique pop star—dress up, make up, and shine in Love Idol Live!
